sourcesContent:
import React, {Component} from 'react'
import { Card, Form, Button, Alert, Container, Modal } from 'react-bootstrap'
import { IoFastFood, IoLocationSharp, IoTimeSharp, IoSaveSharp } from "react-icons/io5";

function Edit() {
    const [show, setShow] = useState(false);

    const handleClose = () => setShow(false);
    const handleShow = () => setShow(true);

        return(
            <Container>
                <Modal.Dialog>
                <Modal.Header closeButton>
                    <Modal.Title>Edit Entry: </Modal.Title>
                </Modal.Header>

                <Modal.Body>
                    
                <Form>
                <Form.Group id="name">
                    <Form.Label>Restaurant Name: </Form.Label>
                    <Form.Control type="name" placeholder="A Delicious Bird" required />
                </Form.Group>

                <Form.Group id="reservation">
                    <Form.Label>Reservation: </Form.Label>
                    <Form.Control type="reservation" placeholder="June 6th 2021"required />
                </Form.Group>

                <Form.Group id="notes">
                    <Form.Label>Notes: </Form.Label>
                    <Form.Control type="notes" placeholder="The food was good"required />
                </Form.Group>

                <Button type="submit" variant="success"><IoSaveSharp /></Button>
            </Form>

                </Modal.Body>

                <Modal.Footer>
                    <Button variant="secondary">Close</Button>
                    <Button variant="primary">Save changes</Button>
                </Modal.Footer>
                </Modal.Dialog>
                
            </Container>
        )
    }

export default Edit
